mapper.select: select b.bno, b.title, b.cre_dt, b.cate, b.likes, b.views, m.nick from boards b left outer join members m on m.mno = b.mno order by b.bno desc limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
select b.bno, b.title, b.content, b.cate, b.views, b.likes, b.cre_dt, m.nick from boards b left outer join members m on m.mno = b.mno where b.bno=#{boardNo}
mapper.update: update boards set views=views + 1 where bno=#{boardNo}
update boards set likes=likes + 1 where bno=#{boardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into boards(mno, title, content, cre_dt, cate) values(#{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{category})
mapper.select: select * from boards order by bno desc limit 1
